name: Transition Altitude
description:
Use thermals and ridge lift to reach your destination.

Control your paraglider and think of how to go where you need to go.

Reach your transition altitude, pass through all checkpoints and land on the landing zone to unlock the next level.

Only 7 levels for now as this is a submission for the FFS2020 Game Jam.

I have plenty of other ideas to add if there's interest.

Transition Altitude is officially my first published game. All made by myself in Unity.

I hope you enjoy it!
